Data:
==Applies To==

* PCI DSS Requirement 10.2.1

==Policy Statement==

Log access to cardholder data.

==Policy Purpose==

Logging individual access to cardholder data helps identify which accounts might have been compromised or abused.

==Related Guidance==

* [[02cca0fd-72ee-42ec-a0e4-386cc9051e63|Log Access to Cardholder Data]]

==Related Checklist Items==

* [[80daaf63-19c7-4d69-beec-ec255660f82d|Access to Cardholder Data Is Logged]]
